nodes.text: The scoop skimmer was an airspeeder used on Utapau chiefly as a transport vessel. Besides Utapau, scoop skimmers could also be found in the skies of Coruscant.

Green-hulled scoop skimmers were designed for use by Pau'ans, and the passenger compartment could seat four. Although chiefly used as transports, some were equipped with light blasters for law enforcement duties. Scoop skimmers used modest thrusters.
